amendment.description: To exclude Minnesota's Northstar Corridor Commuter Rail Project from the Federal transit Administration's medium cost-effectiveness rating requirement for Federal funding.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4321 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4321 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Coleman. (consideration: CR S6377-6392; text: CR S6389) To exclude Minnesota's Northstar Corridor Commuter Rail Project from the Federal transit Administration's medium cost-effectiveness rating requirement for Federal funding.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4321 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4321 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Coleman.
